snippet: Interior Secretary Ryan Zinke on Friday promised a comprehensive review of the federal coal leasing program, even as President Donald Trump moves to do away with a moratorium on coal leases on public lands....

headline.main: For Migrants Headed North, the Things They Carried to the End
headline.print_headline: Things They Carried to the End

lead_paragraph: Interior Secretary Ryan Zinke on Friday promised a comprehensive review of the federal coal leasing program, even as President Donald Trump moves to do away with a moratorium on coal leases on public lands.
